### getParentPad() {#a43199cd27a19d5e84ff5f8be66e80faa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; llvm::sandboxir::FuncletPadInst::getParentPad () const</>}>
Return the outer EH-pad this funclet is nested within.

Note: This returns the associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/catchswitchinst">CatchSwitchInst</a> if this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/funcletpadinst">FuncletPadInst</a> is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/catchpadinst">CatchPadInst</a>.
